name: Cicapair Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30
about: What it is: A bestselling green-to-beige SPF cream that rapidly neutralizes visible redness, evens the appearance of skin tone, and has a natural-looking finish...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Redness..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Mineral Sunscreen (Zinc Oxide and Titanium Dioxide): Forms a protective barrier that reflects UV rays, shielding skin from sun damage...What Else You Need to Know: For centuries, tigers in the Asian wetlands have rolled around in Centella asiatica (AKA tiger grass or cica) to help heal their wounds. Taking inspiration from the tigers, this K-Beauty fave utilizes visibly reparative tiger grass to soothe, calm, and moisturize skin...Research Results: Right after using our bestselling color corrector:.95% said skin felt soothed with moisture.92% said skin looked less red.91% said blemishes and discolorations looked concealed.90% said skin had a vibrant, healthy-looking glow.92% said skin tone looked even In a clinical study with 106 people between 20-50.
ingredients: -Mineral Sunscreen (Zinc Oxide and Titanium Dioxide): Forms a protective barrier that reflects UV rays, shielding skin from sun damage...Water, Centella Asiatica Leaf Water, Isononyl Isononanoate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Beeswax/Cire D'abeille, Glycerin, Diethylhexyl Carbonate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Niacinamide, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Pan-Thenol, Diglycerin, Iron Oxides, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethi- Cone Crosspolymer, Isododecane, Ethylene/Methacrylate Copolymer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Stearic Acid, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer, Sclerotium Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Acrylates/Dimethicone Copolymer, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Chromium Oxide Greens, Triethyl Citrate, Potassium Sorbate, Fragaria Vesca (Strawberry) Leaf Extract, Disodium EDTA, BHT, Alcohol, Asiaticoside, Aden- Osine, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Boron Nitride, Asiatic Acid, Madecassic Acid, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, 1,2- Hexanediol, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Propanediol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Gentiana Lutea Root Extract, Artemisia Absinthium Extract, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Polysorbate 20, Aniba Rosodora (Rosewood) Wood Oil, Sodium Glycerophosphate, Selaginella Lepidophylla Extract, Potassium Magnesium Aspartate, Citric Acid, Calcium Gluconate, Madecassoside, Magnesium Gluconate, Centella Asiatica Meristem Cell Culture, Xanthan Gum, Titanium Dioxide, Zinc Oxide.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to clean, moisturized skin. .-Warm a dime-size amount between your hands, then gently press and blend into your skin. The cream will transform from green to beige as you blend, evening out your skin tone. .-Apply more as needed. .-Use alone as a color corrector for a natural-makeup look..-For more coverage, use as a primer and follow with your favorite foundation...Beauty Tips: .-Build up for extra coverage in concern areas. .-If you have drier skin, use a richer moisturizer before applying.

reviews.review_title: It's okay, but its not for the pale girlies.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's oily and patchy on my skin, but it does work. HOWEVER I am very pale (Mac NC 4.5, Maybelline Fit Me 105) and the pigment in this product pulls very yellow and dark on me. Which is odd to me, because I would think the people most likely to suffer from facial redness (pale girlies with pink skin) should be able to use this product, but no, Dr. Jart disagrees. So here we are. I threw it away after hate-using it for long enough to make me miserable, so sadly I don't have photos of how yellow it looked, but trust me when I say it was bad. Also the lemongrass smell is strong, and somewhat off putting the first few times I used it, but it's not a bad smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is fantastic to help spot cover redness on fair skin. I am 58 with very mild rosacea and some redness on my cheeks. My skin is dry to normal. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: dr jart cicapair is advertised as skin care, but it gives makeup; its giving color correcting concealer. I have eczema on my neck and some redness above my lip/ under my nose and i thought this would be perfect. When i first apply it, it conceals the redness, however after wearing it for all day it ends up irritating my skin. By the end of the day it aggravates my eczema, causing itchiness and then the redness gets worse :/. in sum, i found that this makes my eczema and redness worse. i am better off looking for solutions to the cause rather than just treating the symptoms (appearance of redness) with this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this for color correction, and I use it instead of foundation. I don't use a lot at once, so I use sunscreen underneath. I find it helps minimize redness and pairs well with my routine. I don't know of another product like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Why is it orange? It looks lovely and green initially but when I blend it into my skin and it turns orange. I can see little streaks of orange developing in the product as I apply it. The first try I was briefly concerned my fingers were bleeding or something. Just to be safe I tried it with a clean cotton swab on my partners hand and the same thing happened. Iu2019m so disappointed.  I am very pale, I wear a mac nw10, so maybe itu2019s only for darker skin tones. All the same, youu2019d think the orange would be advertised.

reviews.review_title: AMAZING for a no makeup day!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for about 2 months now and I LOVE it. I have dry acne prone skin and I wanted something with light coverage that would even out the redness on my skin to wear alone, and this delivered (bonus points for SPF).  It's perfect for a my-skin-but-better kinda product, if I know Im going to be working hard and sweating I'll add a light dusting of powder all over and setting spray andits's amazing. With that being said, I'm very fair and this works well for me, but if you have a deeper skintone (probably any deeper than light-medium), this will probably be too light. It would be awesome if they expanded their shade range to include more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: With sensitive skin and rosecea i find this works wonders. Not only does it help sooth the but it takes away the redness. its a must have for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A product I ALWAYS have on hand!  I actually use it in conjunction with a few drops of Bio-Oil, as it helps it spread easier and helps with the appearance of my hyperpigmented acne scars.  I love that I can use it as a sort of BB cream. I am extremely pale, and there are literally NO brands I have ever been able to find that make a BB cream formula light enough for me.  Again, being very pale, the fact that this includes SPF makes it a must have. I even have (a mild) intermittent rosacea, and this stuff conceals the redness in my face beautifully.  The Centella Asiatica in it is also UNBELIEVABLY great at healing the skin and supporting the skin barrier. I often see improvement in skin irritation overnight.  If you're also pale, however, I would start small with this one; any more than a small dab on a finger, and you run a slight risk of looking a ruddy orange color (especially true if you're not blending this down into the neck and decollette.

reviews.review_title: pale girlies  with acne CAN use this

The jar is cute tho so I look forward to using it after I'm done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! I have a lot of redness in my T Zone..After applying it onto my skin my redness is almost gone completely! It's also great because you don't need to apply foundation with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product!  I like how it helps to both cover and conceal redness, as well as reduce and soothe it.   A little goes a long way.  I find that it can be used just as a spot corrector where needed,  or all over the face to even out skin tone.   Works great as a primer/corrector before makeup or just on its own.   It has spf, but I wouldn't recommend skipping sunscreen for this unless you're going to use enough of the product to make it effective as a sunscreen on its own.   Lately I have been spreading a thin layer over the entire face, then going back in and dabbing a little extra on the areas that need a bit more help.   I recommend letting it set for a few minutes before applying foundation or concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Much better than expected. Does a great job minimizing redness around my nose and chin due to rosacea. Can apply and then finish with powder and Iu2019m good to go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail of products! I have rosacea and this almost completely covers the redness. Itu2019s light weight and a little product goes a long way. Leaves my face looking so smooth and clear. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I used it, it was immediately soothing and took away almost 80% of the redness. My skin does not react well to all niacinamide products, same as retinol. However, within 20 minutes it actually calmed the rosacea flare. I was not regularly using it but after it soothed a huge flare up last night I will. I wouldn't apply it heavily to any areas of breakouts frequently as it may clog pores but it's great for a sun protectant extreme flares!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t usually write reviews, but I made a whole profile to write a review on this product. I love it. I have acne and rosacea, and this product takes away 99% of the redness from my face. I canu2019t begin to tell you how nice it is for my face to finally be one color, save for a little bit of a blush look in my cheeks. And it has spfud83dude2d bless. 10/10 recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, it is 100% worth the money. I was always skeptical of this product at first and confused if it actually worked, and it really does! Not only does it get rid of the redness on your skin but it makes it way more clear and smooth.

reviews.review_title: Fair and sensitive Skinned people beware!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this.product. I have proble.s.with redness.in my cheeks.and thos.o covers completely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really LIKE this product but I donu2019t LOVE it. That being said with some trial and error Iu2019ve found the easiest way to make this product work for me: * use a light moisturizer first. * a little goes a long way. Pull out about half of the scoop and rub it in between your fingers first, then pat into your skin. * I then use a light dusting of setting powder to keep it in place (my oily t-zone guarantees that product breaks up on my nose and chin by the end of the day.)  I like that it has SPF 30 and calms down my natural redness. I donu2019t like how heavy it can feel especially when itu2019s hot outside. I would love a set-it-and-forget-it product but that isnu2019t what this is. I also wish it wasnu2019t $73. ud83dude44

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best red neutralizing sunscreen. So smooth and creamy. A little goes a long way!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for years now! I like lighter makeup and this is the perfect product. When I tell people I use a tinted cream type thing, theyu2019re always surprised! It just melts into the skin so beautifully

Unfortunately even following these directions, and being careful to only use a small amount, I ended up with repeated significant breakouts combined with itchy hives. I chose this product for its colour correction promises and SPF, but Iu2019ll be returning it because it just doesnu2019t work for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have mixed feelings about this product. definitely does what it claims to do: corrects redness and soothes skin. It starts out green but quickly turns beige (itu2019s best if you warm it up on your fingers before applying on your face). It color corrects and evens out the skin nicely.  Itu2019s a bit heavy, though, and tends to be drying. And, to me, the herbal scent is a bit off putting. I have very fair skin, but I can imagine it giving a white cast to deeper skin tones if worn alone. reviews.review_text: I like the product and it definitely does as intended, however I have a few complaints bringing down my review here. I typically opt for a tinted sunscreen or tinted moisturizer and they don't cover the beige hue of this, so just something to keep in mind. The product is also very oily. Like I'm talking I have to use at least two oil blotting papers plus a swipe of my volcanic rollerball after application to tame the oil that comes out of the product. Surprisingly I don't think the oil has made my acne worse but I'm wondering if that's less to do with the product and more to do with me making sure I blot all the oil off before I apply my makeup. It does do as intended though and really corrects redness and also tones down the look of angry acne for a more uniform colour once you apply foundation. I highly recommend it, just be informed about the product when purchasing and don't be surprised by the smell and the oils.

reviews.review_title: Great at cancelling redness, but use a thin layer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As you can see in the photo, this stuff really cancels out redness! My face goes tomato-red when I use Tarte Knockout lactic acid treatment. Cicapair tones it down almost completely. I normally donu2019t have that much redness though and use Cicapair to even out my skin tone (my cheeks have patches of mild redness and hyperpigmentation) when I donu2019t feel like wearing makeup. This product has a slight yellow shade to it to cancel out the redness. A little goes a long way, so start off with a thin layer and let the colour adjust to your skin for a few mins. Even though I donu2019t consider this to be makeup, it does sit similar to foundation on my face, and it can show texture if you look closely or if I have too thick of a layer. I also look jaundiced if I apply too liberally. Overall, I think this would work really well for people with rosacea and redness, based on the results in the photo, when my face was reacting to the lactic acid treatment I did.

The coverage it gives is no different from a sheer colour corrector or a green tinted primer (think smashbox.)   I tried this a few different ways and this is what I found: It did tone down my redness in areas that I spot treated and built upon, but thereu2019s a wasnu2019t any miracle happening. Iu2019m not sure why some people say it made them orangeu2026 they must be pretty pale. Iu2019m pale but I use tanning drops just for some glow, and this stuff made me look grey. I kept waiting for it to oxidize and look at least a little yellow.   Iu2019d did start to pill on my face after about an hour of being on. I followed the directions and moisturized first. A moisturizer that is thicker (I have dryer skin,) but I can load up on and apply concealer soon after with no problems. This product was the only thing so far to pill with my moisturizer.  Overall, Iu2019d say try it for yourself, but I was looking for something closer to skincare than makeup to reduce red spots so I could wear less makeup or even no makeup looks, but this wasnu2019t it. reviews.review_title: Good as a colour-correcting BB cream, NOT an SPF
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I hated this product when I first got it so badly that I made sure to warn all of my girlfriends against it. Now, after working with it a few times, I think I now have a much more balanced perspective on its pros and cons. It's a great colour-correcting BB cream, as long as you do NOT use it as an SPF. I'm a big sun-protection advocator and use SPF50 365 days a year, shine or rain. I got this product as part of a value set and was shocked by how bad it looked as an SPF when I first used it. I have very light olive skin with some small areas of redness. So I was looking forward to the effects this products might give me with the added benefit of an SPF 30 sun-protection. For its sun-protection function to be fully effective, the amount of product you have to use will make your face a lifeless beige mask. And with that amount of product, I find that it does not set fully and will move around which makes it unsightly if you wear glasses or mask. However, if you ignore the fact that it has an SPF of 30 and only use it as a colour-correcting BB cream, it is very easy to apply (on top of other sunscreens that I have) and looks very natural since you will need to only use the amount needed to cover redness and even skin tone, which is much less. I use it instead of foundation or concealer on days when I don't want or need a full face of makeup. For this product, I believe it's an either-or situtaion. If you want the sun-production, you are going to look like a mannequin. If you want your skin to look natural and even-toned, you are exposing yourself to UV... Is it worth it? No, in my opinion. If you can ignore the SPF30, it's not useless.

reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 3 years now.  I moisturize my face and then apply the Cicapair.  You don't need much, one jar lasts a long time.  It is the best redness reducing product with sunscreen product I have ever used.  It goes on smooth, isn't greasy and leaves a beautiful matt finish.  It is waterproof and stays true all day.  My dermatologist was very impressed with the ingredients. Your skin tone is flawless and it gives you a youthful glow.  No need for any makeup it has amazing coverage. reviews.review_text: Got a sample of this product and I was pleasantly surprised!! I was out of my BB cream so decided to use a bit of this and the coverage was great! My nose has redness and my chin always has big breakouts but this covered them just as well as concealer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I use it every day and my skin has only gotten clearer. I donu2019t wear foundation so this was the perfect solution for me. I have combination skin and sunburn SO easy. I havenu2019t had a sunburn since I started using this product (I am still cautious to avoid too much direct sun and west a hat whenever I can)   10/10 recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Sephora website says oil free in the product name but this product is not oil free. Just read the ingredients. I have oily skin. My face feels oily an hour after applying the product. I think this product is comedogenic or clogs pores because after using it for just a few days, pimples and bumps on my face surfaced.   the color correction is effective on redness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product did not help me at all. I have dry and sensitive skin and this made me break out. The cream was separated and I tried my best to stir it around so the oil would blend but that did not help. It also made my face very shiny so it looked like I had oily skin. It did not cover or help with my redness as well. I do not recommend this product if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was very disappointing. The cream didnu2019t correct very well, itu2019s very think, and left a horrible white cast. Keep in mind, I am only a  light medium to medium skin tone.   Veryverydisappointed

reviews.review_title: Dr. Jart to the Redness Rescue
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am reviewing this product after about 2 weeks of use. My skin is reddened from sun damage and I have visible red capillaries with no makeup. I feel the redness is not disappearing, rather it is less noticeable. My foundation looks less orangey nownoticeable prominent withoutprprominent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderfully thick and luxurious! A tinted almost finish!  Corrects all redness and hyperpigmentation! With out need to wear foundation to cover after if wanted

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I could I would give this 1000000 stars.  Perfect for those who do not like the feel of makeup but have redness. My skin is clear without texture and this stuff is PERFECT. I donu2019t even wear any foundation now. I find it very easy to blend after skin prep, warm it in my hands and it rubs on perfectly. No green cast as it changes to a skin tone colour. Now, I donu2019t know how this would work or you arenu2019t fair skinned with TRUE redness/rosacea. It also feels like you have nothing on your face. I love CICA and the smell is yum. Would buy again! I actually wish I didnu2019t purchase the mini one because I know I will be restocking this product 100%!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, my skin had a terrible reaction to this product. I used it for almost a week to see if my skin would adapt.  My face turned yet wherever I applied the product, which was mostly my cheeks and chin. When I stopped using it, my skin calmed down and was normal within 2 days. I may have been allergic to the sunscreen ingredients.   apart from the allergy, I did notice it neutralized redness. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely fixes my redness but also doesn't blend very well. I wouldn't buy again and honestly before you buy go look at any youtube review to see how pale it'll make you

reviews.review_title: Must have for fair skin with redness
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fair skin and freckles during summer time. For someone who never wears foundation this is amazing to even your skin tone. A little goes a long way (no orange finish, no white cast if you apply a small amount.) Consider this as a 2 in 1 with the SPF 30. I would highly recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not for pale/fair skin. Made me look like I had a bad spray tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gets rid of redness however it does make you look a bit paler than your usual skin tone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: too thick and dark for my very pale skin. the camo drops are perfect though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I literally got this because I have no time to put make up on with a newborn. I wanted to still feel myself but not looking dead tired everyday. This does the job, it's basically a moisturizer, sunscreen, and light coverage foundation all in one. I do find it a bit oily, otherwise, it's a decent product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes
reviews.review_text: I no longer need to use foundation or concealer! This product does it all and gives me a natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have ufffcrosacea and it did help with my redness but also made me orange. It has a disgusting and gross texture made my skin look ugly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It did not work for me.  I have redness on my nose and chin areas.  This product did not reduce the redness.  The texture is very thick.  And I have breakouts after a few uses.  I have to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using mini and sample sizes of this for a while. I splurged and got the full size. It came separated like a lot of the reviews show, but I've been using it anyways, since I don't have a Sepora local to me. It's now causing 15+ tiny white heads when I use it. So, unfortunately for me, this is a pass.

reviews.review_title: Acne prone ladies do not buy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews but the level of breakout that this product has caused enrages me beyond belief. I was so excited for a redness reducing skincare product to replace tinted sunscreen or cc cream but this is AWFUL and frankly should not be sold to anyone remotely acne prone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Conceals my redness so I can go foundation free! I donu2019t wear a full face of makeup much these days, so this product is amazing! It blurs my redness and smooths my complexion on days I donu2019t want to wear foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Finally decided to buy the full-size after years of buying the mini. Disappointed to see that it is only half full.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE. One of my favourite products and neither my husband nor I will go without it. Does exactly as it says and you donu2019t need to use much product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Soooo good. My husband loves this stuff and wonu2019t go without it. Does wonders for redness and hyperpigmentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my fingerprint marks after trying to blend it and it CLINGS to dry skin that didnt even show before using this. Yes, even after hydrating my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Found this to be very drying to the skin and tinted my face orange. Did not mask any redness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff WORKS. I have super sensitive acne prone skin, this doesnu2019t cause any breakout. Does what it says it does 10/10. However Wish it came in an airless pump so you donu2019t have to stick your fingers in a jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this at first and as time went on eventually it started to separate and it became very watery and almost impossible to apply. It works fine but it takes a lot of effort to rub in which made my skin very irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am acne prone and didn't want to wear makeup. this was supposed to help me with my marks and acne (given the cica). it was so oily on my skin. I wore it in spring and now that the weather is warmer. I cannot describe this product but oily and heavy and uncomfortable. My skin did not improve at all. Even as a redness-diffuser, it didn't do well.

reviews.review_title: Beware if you have sensitive skin/rosaceau2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t understand how this is targeted for people with redness (and therefore probably sensitive skin). It contains SO many essential oils and plant extracts that any dermatologist will tell you to stay away from! Irritated my rosacea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So so bummed! I love the Tiger Grass serum - it is amazing! However, this dried my skin out so badly and made my redness even more pronounced. Unfortunately, this was a miss for me.

reviews.review_title: Amazing product, not great for a flight attendant
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product, as someone who continues to search for something that helps with my redness but also is lightweight, this was a star.  I will have to say that I cannot use it when I am on an aircraft as it is not moisturizing enough and flakes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This doesn't look like treatment i used few times but didn't helped me at all so returning this item.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is the BOMB. I am a 50-something white man with pinkish skin. Not only does this provide the sunscreen my dermatologist says I should always wear, but it offsets the reddish tones in my skin and gives it a more matte appearance. And it's a mild concealer as well. Terrific! The only catch is that I have blondish hair and if any gets in my hair or beard it turns it very green - wiping with a dry cloth can get that out though.

reviews.review_title: good but not for my skin colour
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This offers medium coverage and applies smoothly. I would keep it if the shade worked on me. If you have fair, fair to light skin, it looks greyish on you. It would be good for daily use or casual activity, I think. This offers medium coverage and applies smoothly. I would keep it if the shade worked on me. If you have fair, fair to light skin, it looks greyish on you. If you do not expect to replace this with foundation, this one would be good for daily use or casual activity, I think.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s not bad, it does the job with helping my redness and covering it. But it does cling to my few odd dry patches on my face so I do wear a moisturizer before I put this on and that really helped with issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fairly strong scent, I like the spf although it is quite greasy. Better to target the red areas than for all over the face as it is quite yellow. Clings onto dry patches so make sure you exfoliate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this product works so well for redness! only use on targeted areas though or your face will look so yellow like you died a day ago ud83dude2d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I tried the cicapair line a while back, and didn't really see the point. Luckily, I still have a red blotchy face and got this as part of the SPF bundle Sephora was doing.  It's great for a no-make-up day if you want to look less red than normal, especially if it's nice and sunny outside. THIS IS NOT SUNSCREEN. Do not go outside without real SPF, haha.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have a neutral/cool fair skin tone. I took this product on vacation and didn't bring any other products. it's a solid product and applies nicely but if you have a cool undertone, in my experience, it can pull very yellow. you can blend it out to defuse it but if that's the only thing on your skin you may notice it. it isn't super yellow and most won't notice it so I will continue using this product, it covers redness very nicely perhaps a little patchy but I do wish I knew how yellow it pulled before I bought it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is really great. It works great for my skintone, and it doesn't feel heavy or oily. If you had super dry skin, this may not be for you, as I find by the end of the day it can make me ever so slightly dry. Smells nice as well.

reviews.review_title: patchy and broke through oily skin in 6-7 hours
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a sample that was enough for a few uses. It was ok.   Redness did go away for 2-3 hours after I used this layered over usual moisturizer, it reminded me of the kind of color correct I get from zinc-based sunscreen. But after 6-7 hours, it became patchy and weird due to my oily skin breaking through its barrier. It is decent moisture for me, didn't make me more oily than usual. Gave it 3 stars but I can't blame the product for my oil.. but redness claim was short effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping to use this for a super light no makeup day. Sadly since I have a very cool undertone, the color correcting on this oxidized so much on my skin and I could very clearly see a yellow tone in patches on my face. Before you buy this I would definitely try to get a sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My peau u00e9tait grise! Le produit se dessu00e8che et entre dans les pores de peau.  Lu2019odeur trop forte. Je lu2019ai retournu00e9.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love cicapair! After it being recommended by one of the workers. I decided to try it. It did not disappoint !! I have bad Rosacea. And this product has taken the red out!
